nodes.text: Geraps Sule was a gas giant–type planet with eleven moons that occupied the sixth orbital position around the star Abo. It was located within the Lehon system, a part of the Unknown Regions' area known as the Tempered Wastes.
Geraps Sule was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the Lehon system, and therefore Geraps Sule, in grid square G-11.
